label: An international group of lesbian and gay Jews attempting to hold their own remembrance service at lsrael's National Museum and memorial to the Holocaust, Yad Vashem, 31 Mai1994, were subjected during their ceremony to intimidation and a violent demonstration by right-wing lsraelis.
